content.text: A collection of useful apps built from a combination components, layouts, and reactivity. Compared to the gallery, templates provide a more minimal yet useful starting point for your next app.
Basic starting points highlighting common layouts and components.
Go from a basic Gen AI chatbot to something more sophisticated.
At their core, dashboards are a combination of sidebar layout with cards and value boxes.
Reactive file reading and polling provide an easy and useful way to “stream” updates to files, folders, databases, and more.
Validate and record user input to a questionnaire.
